specialAbilities.Blood Frenzy: The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.
specialAbilities.Water Breathing: The quipper can breathe only underwater.
specialAbilities.Swarm: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny quipper. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
